file_content.text: [Kaiya is deep in a healing trance. She does not stir.]
The very fact that you have returned tells me that you have defeated the White Terror. Well done.
I'm glad I could help.
Your modesty does you credit.
Hey--I'm the best there is.
Such confidence. But I suppose you have the skills to back it up.
I must leave now.
So be it.
Thank you for your aid. There are many who now owe their lives to you.
Now, I must return to my healing trance. Farewell.
What are you waiting for? The creature might decide to go off looking for food again.
Didn't your mother ever tell you it's rude to interrupt a lady's beauty sleep?
No matter--I'll re-enter the healing trance later. I'm Kaiya Stas--did you wake me for a purpose?
My apologies. I thought you were in trouble.
I came to see if I could help.
Just doing my good deed for the day.
Thought I'd lend a hand.
I see. Well, your sentiments are appreciated, even if your timing is terrible.
Why are you in a healing trance?
What happened to you?
Thought I'd prod your body with a stick to relieve the monotony.
Not really. I was bored.
Most amusing, but this situation is very serious.
The White Terror did this to me. It's a wampa, but... so much more. Imagine a battleship next to a starfighter.
The creature was roving farther afield in its search for food. Its path would have taken it straight to an Ortolan colony. I had to try and stop it.
A Jedi protects the weak. It was the right thing.
You did what was needed.
If only I'd succeeded.
Not every wampa can take down a Jedi.
It must be pretty tough.
Real noble. Stupid, but noble.
At least you tried.
That's a bit worrying.
Maybe you should have just left it alone.
Guess that didn't work out.
That was not an option, not if I wanted to save innocent lives. But I was not careful enough.
I escaped the creature using an old Force trick, but my wound prevented me from fighting on.
Please--you have to stop it. If it finds a ready source of food, it won' t leave 'til it has finished. The colony will be wiped out.
I'll gladly help.
You are a brave warrior. I thank you.
No creature scares me.
Overconfidence was my mistake.
Take this sonic agitator into the creature's lair. The disturbances will draw him out into the open. Good luck to you.
Can't help. [Refuse quest]
Then leave me to complete my healing trance. I just hope I can heal myself enough before the creature returns.
[The body, though warm, does not respond.]
